price: Berkatalah Muhammad (kepada mereka), "Tuhan-ku mengetahui semua perkataan di langit dan di bumi dan Dia-lah Yang Maha Mendengar lagi Maha Mengetahui".
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّي يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbī yaʿlamu al-qawla fī al-samāi wal-arḍi wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
